content:
From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
For some time now

isabelle build -v -o document=pdf

no longer seems(?) to tell me where it put the pdf file. It would be nice if it
did that again.

Tobias
smime.p7s

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
On 06/08/2020 17:26, Tobias Nipkow wrote:

For some time now

isabelle build -v -o document=pdf

no longer seems(?) to tell me where it put the pdf file. It would be nice if
it did that again.

See now

changeset: 72107:411b3dc036ca
user: wenzelm

From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
On 07/08/2020 00:13, Makarius wrote:

On 06/08/2020 17:26, Tobias Nipkow wrote:

For some time now

isabelle build -v -o document=pdf

no longer seems(?) to tell me where it put the pdf file. It would be nice if
it did that again.

See now

changeset: 72107:411b3dc036ca
user: wenzelm
date: Thu Aug 06 23:44:43 2020 +0200
files: src/Pure/Tools/build.scala
description:
recovered stderr for PIDE batch-build, such as "Browser info at ...",
"Document at ..." (see also 940195fbb282, 5469bacf5573, 5c4800f6b25a);

Thanks.

Note that option -v is not relevant for that.

For me it is.

Tobias

Makarius

smime.p7s
